body:
Also, names prefixed with underscores are really meant to be internal, so we should never recommend people to do something with them. Just make it `__torch_unserializable__` or `torch_unserializable`, or even better provide a decorator for marking functions unserializable:
```python
from torch.utils.hooks import unserializable_hook
```
